summary: The FORECAST Act of 2025 aims to improve weather research and forecasting by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA). It focuses on enhancing subseasonal-to-seasonal forecasting capabilities, including developing multi-model ensemble forecast systems, utilizing advanced data assimilation methods, and leveraging emerging technologies like AI. The bill also establishes a Weather and Earth System Modeling and Data Assimilation Workforce Innovation Program to support education, recruitment, and workforce development in this field. It authorizes appropriations for these efforts.
